text: Édouard Ferrand (25 April 1965 - 1 February 2018) was a French politician. He was born in Lyon, France. He was a member of National Front. He was a Front National MEP and regional councillor in Burgundy. He was elected to the European Parliament in May 2014.French interior ministry Ferrand died on 1 February 2018 in Paris of cancer at the age of 52.Décès de l'eurodéputé FN Édouard Ferrand à l'âge de 52 ans ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:MEPs for France Category:Politicians from Lyon
title: Édouard Ferrand
